name: Instagram Story Preview
description:
About

Two Instagram screens were redrawn in Figma: editing screen and published story. It allows you to preview your story as well as use this UI in your design cases.


Use

Just replace component content with your design.

Don't forget to change username and profile picture. You can also pick your close friend's pic!


By the way, the whole file is pretty editable.


Open to change

Duplicate, investigate, change and publish to make it better and optimized. Please mention me if you're using this in projects. I'll be happy.


-> My email -> My Telegram
